description: Your hardwork draws me here: PM speaks at the L&T workers complex in Riyadh pic.twitter.com/MuPOJpyS1n — PMO India (@PMOIndia) April 2, 2016 When in the times to come, people will see the work you've done, you will realise the importance of your efforts: PM @narendramodi — PMO India (@PMOIndia) Apri…
caption: n-m4.in
message:
Visit to L&T Workers' Residential Complex gave me the opportunity to meet workers whose hardwork will impact generations to come. 

Talked about why India is best placed to cater to the global demands for skilled manpower. http://n-m4.in/21ZdWYj
